Title: The Truth Hurts
Plot: Pete and Myka capture Paracelsus but not before he makes himself immortal. When Myka's cancer becomes worse, Pete must make a deal with Paracelsus to cure his partner. Meanwhile, Claudia receives some startling news from Artie.
GuestStars: James Marsters, Anthony Head, Kelly Hu, Josh Blaylock, CCH Pounder, Genelle Williams
